revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=R6220 |revision=-100NAS |asin=B00QGOQ2BA |est_release_date=12/02/2014 |fcc_date=10/07/2014 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=SerComm |availability=common |type=wireless router |fcc_id=PY314200274 |ic_id=4054A-14200274 |pcb_id=AYA00B-1.6MM |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7621ST |cpu1_cspeed=880 |cpu1_cores=1 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX30LF1G08AA-TI |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5CB64M16FP-DH |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, J4 |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7603EN |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi2_chip1_model=MT7612EN |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |stock_os=Linux;2.6.36; |tp_firmware=Padavan (unofficially),OpenWrt, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui=DC:EF:09 |oui_eth=DC:EF:09 }} {{TagLine|AC1200 Wireless Dual Band Gigabit Router}} :[http://www.netgear.com/home/products/networking/wifi-routers/R6220.aspx Product page] "AYA00B-1.6MM" is silkscreened on the board in the images. {{see also|SerComm|Netgear WNDR3700v5}} ===Reviews=== *[https://openitforum.pl/index/recenzje/routery/netgear/r6220/ ''Netgear R6220'' on '''OpenITforum'''] *[https://www.bestbuybusiness.com/bbfb/en/US/adirect/bestbuy?cmd=catProductDetail&showAddButton=true&productID=BB19597358 ''Netgear AC1200 Dual-Band Wireless-AC Router''] ===Firmware=== Firmware image "R6220-V1.0.0.8_1.0.1.img" downloaded :from FTP contains a bootloader for MT7621. Uncompressed size of the image is 50MB, so at least :64MB NAND flash are likely to be present. Wireless driver module is listed as ''rlt_wifi.ko'' {{SCollapse|rlt_wifi.ko • >> |
filename:       /lib/modules/2.6.36/kernel/drivers/
                net/wireless/rlt_wifi_ap/rlt_wifi.ko

license:        GPL
alias:          pci:v000014C3d00007602sv*sd*bc*sc*i*
alias:          pci:v000014C3d00007612sv*sd*bc*sc*i*
alias:          pci:v000014C3d00007632sv*sd*bc*sc*i*
alias:          pci:v000014C3d00007662sv*sd*bc*sc*i*
alias:          pci:v00001400d00007662sv*sd*bc*sc*i*
alias:          pci:v00001400d00007650sv*sd*bc*sc*i*
alias:          pci:v00001814d00003091sv*sd*bc*sc*i*
depends:        
vermagic:       2.6.36 SMP mod_unload MIPS32_R2 32BIT
}} {{SCollapse|/proc/mtd • >> |
# cat /proc/mtd

}} ==Images== *[http://fotkidepo.ru/?id=album:55058 Gallery on '''iXBT'''] File:Netgear R6220 PCB.jpg|Netgear R6220 PCB File:Pin Serial TTL R6220.jpg|Serial port [[Has images::internal| ]] File:R6220-top.jpg|main File:R6220-rear.jpg|back [[Has images::external| ]] __NOTOC__
